imagefile.description: Use this to upload image files.

anyfile.name: Any File
anyfile.description: Use this to upload any type of file.

metatitle.caption: Page title
metatitle.help: Between 5 and 60 characters that will be shown in Google search results.

metakeywords.caption: Page keywords
metakeywords.help: Comma-separated keywords used to boost ranking in Google search results.

metadescription.caption: Page description
metadescription.help: A short paragraph that will be shown in Google search results.

startpage.name: Start
startpage.description: The home page for a website with an area for blocks and partial pages.

FooterText.caption: Content in footer
FooterText.help: This content will be shown in the footer for this site

CompanyName.caption: Name of the company
CompanyName.help: Company name will be shown in the top left corner of every page

MainContentArea.caption: Main content area
MainContentArea.help: Drag and drop images, blocks, folders, and pages with partial templates.

BackgroundImage.caption: Background image
BackgroundImage.help: Choose a background image for this page.

SliderContentArea.help: Drag and drop images, blocks and pages with partial templates.

RelatedContentArea.caption: Related content area
RelatedContentArea.help: Drag and drop images, blocks and pages with partial templates.

aboutuspage.name: About us
aboutuspage.description: The about-us page for a website with two areas for blocks and partial pages.

MainContentArea.help: Drag and drop images, blocks, folders, and pages with partial templates.

MainContentAreaHeading.help: A short heading above the main content area

RelatedContentArea.caption: Related content area
RelatedContentArea.help: Drag and drop images, blocks and pages with partial templates.

MainBodyHeading.caption: Main body heading
MainBodyHeading.help: A short heading above the main body

MainBodyImage.caption: Main body image
MainBodyImage.help: An image above under the Main body heading and above the Main body
